state.response: افریقہ میں زراعت کے سب سے پرانے شواہد تقریباً 10,000 سال پہلے کے ہیں۔
claims: Africa has the oldest agriculture evidence from 10,000 years ago

state.response: افریقہ میں زراعت کے سب سے پرانے شواہد تقریباً 10,000 سال پہلے کے ہیں۔
claims: Africa has the oldest agriculture evidence from 10,000 years ago

Africa has the oldest agriculture eviden: oldest agriculture evidence Africa 10,000 years ago agriculture evidence Africa

In particular, the remnants of cowpea discovered at Kakapel rock shelter and directly dated to 2,300 years ago constitute the earliest documented arrival of a domesticated crop — and presumably of farming lifeways — to eastern Africa.
oldest agriculture evidence Africa 10,000 years ago agriculture evidence Africa

More than 200,000 seeds—in small circular concentrations—were discovered at Takarkori, which showed that hunter-gatherers developed an early form of agriculture by harvesting and storing crops. The investigation at Takarkori provided the first-known evidence of storage and cultivation of cereal seeds in Africa.
